body:
Basically, make a rotation with maps that take forever, for example:

Quintus
Luar
Dust Devils
Frostbite
Clay Wars
Senex 1
Senex 2

title: [Suggestion] The stalemate rot

replies.body: I like the idea, but I think if we do so, we should implement a time limit on each one (Probably from about 45-60 minutes). If nobody wins within the time limit, everyone automatically receives x amount of credits.
replies.body_tagged: I like the idea, but I think if we do so, we should implement a time limit on each one (Probably from about 45-60 minutes). If nobody wins within the time limit, everyone automatically receives x amount of credits.

replies.body:
My life would be on this Rotation :P
+69
replies.body_tagged:
My life would be on this Rotation :P
+69

replies.body: Yeah! Similar to the way the tourney maps function. So, let's say there are 2 monuments on each team, Red team breaks a monument and Blue doesn't. When the timer finishes, Red team will win the game. And if it's a draw, then it's just a draw. I Hope that was easy to understand!
replies.body_tagged: Yeah! Similar to the way the tourney maps function. So, let's say there are 2 monuments on each team, Red team breaks a monument and Blue doesn't. When the timer finishes, Red team will win the game. And if it's a draw, then it's just a draw. I Hope that was easy to understand!
